```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Setting up dependencies.

```{r dependencies, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(magrittr)
library(neuralnet)
library(caret)
set.seed(123)
```
Load data.

```{r}
data("iris")
str(iris)
indices = sample(1:nrow(iris), round(nrow(iris) * 0.8)) %>% sort()
train = iris[indices,]
test = iris[-indices,]
xtest = test[,-5]
ytest = test[, 5]
```

Fit neural network.

```{r}
nnet = neuralnet(
  Species ~ .,
  train,
  hidden = c(4, 3),
  act.fct = "tanh",
  linear.output = FALSE
)
plot(nnet, rep = "best")
```

Get predictions.

```{r}
ypred = neuralnet::compute(nnet, xtest)
yhat = ypred$net.result
print(yhat)

yhat = data.frame(
  "yhat" = ifelse(max.col(yhat[, 1:3]) == 1, "setosa",
  ifelse(max.col(yhat[, 1:3]) == 2, "versicolor", 
         "virginica"))
)
```

Make confusion matrix.

```{r}
confusionMatrix(as.factor(ytest), as.factor(yhat$yhat))$table
mean(ifelse(as.character(iris[-indices, 5]) == yhat, 0, 1))
```
